name: 1 BHK Deep Cleaning
description: Comprehensive deep cleaning for a 1 BHK apartment, ensuring every corner sparkles.
features: Thorough cleaning of all rooms including living room, bedroom, kitchen, and bathroom.
Deep cleaning of floors, windows, and ceiling fans.
Dry vacuuming of sofas and carpets (if applicable).
Removal of cobwebs and dusting of all accessible areas.

reviews.name: Raj
reviews.comment: Best service ever! Very thorough and quick.

reviews.name: Neha
reviews.comment: Professional team and sparkling clean home!

name: 2 BHK Deep Cleaning
description: Complete deep cleaning for a 2 BHK apartment, leaving it spotless.
features: Deep cleaning of two bedrooms, living room, kitchen, and bathrooms.
Wet mopping and disinfection of all hard floors.
Dusting and wiping of furniture and fixtures.

reviews.name: Amit
reviews.comment: Very satisfied with the deep cleaning!
